name: Tenchu: Shadow Assault
description: Local Multiplayer 2-4, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-4, HD (High Definition). Tenchu, the world-famous ninja action game, is now on Xbox LIVE Arcade. Control your favorite characters as you use a variety of ninja weapons to defeat your enemies and complete your missions. Use traps in multiplayer mode to kill your friends for massive points! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
